definition: variant of 繞|绕[rao4], to rotate around/to spiral/to move around/to go round (an obstacle)/to by-pass/to make a detour
to wind/to coil (thread)/to rotate around/to spiral/to move around/to go round (an obstacle)/to by-pass/to make a detour/to confuse/to perplex

sentences.english: It is supposed to look like a sunset or sunrise with clouds over water.
sentences.chinese: 这幅画作看起来就像是大海之上云雾萦绕的日出日落。

sentences.english: The notion that she had forgotten to lock the front door obsessed mother all through the movie.
sentences.chinese: 在看电影的时候，忘了销前站的想法一直萦绕着妈妈。

sentences.english: Full of cold air around the pain, the eyes of a burning white.
sentences.chinese: 满满的冷气萦绕在周围，痛的眼前一片灼白。

sentences.english: As we watch with mounting melancholy the devastation from Sichuan, a question lingers, and troublingly.
sentences.chinese: 当我们看到四川悲剧，脑子里萦绕著一个苦恼的问题。

sentences.english: Your face haunts my dreams like the rain at night.
sentences.chinese: 萦绕梦中，犹若夜雨，画的都是你的影。

sentences.english: Her wistful face haunt my dreams like the rain at night.
sentences.chinese: 她充满渴望的容颜，如夜雨一般，萦绕于我的梦境。

sentences.english: But Iraq isn’t going to leave the U.S. Army.
sentences.chinese: 然而，伊拉克的余音却会一直萦绕在美国陆军周围。

sentences.english: Nevertheless, the high cliffs and peaks are often shrouded in clouds and mist.
sentences.chinese: 且悬崖峭壁萦绕在云雾之中。

sentences.english: There were always skylarks, their songs hanging over the fields of dark gold.
sentences.chinese: 总会有云雀的歌声萦绕在沉甸甸金黄色的田野上空。

sentences.english: Memories of the old days haunted him。
sentences.chinese: 对过去岁月的回忆常常萦绕在他的心头。

sentences.english: The song would haunt us for months.
sentences.chinese: 这首歌将在我们脑海里萦绕数月。

sentences.english: His happy laughter still rings in our ears.
sentences.chinese: 他的音容笑貌依然萦绕我们的耳际。

sentences.english: His father's last words clung to his memory.
sentences.chinese: 父亲的遗言萦绕在他脑际。

sentences.english: Nourished lavenders have been surrounded by chained hearts.
sentences.chinese: 用串联的心萦绕著饱尝滋养的薰衣草。

sentences.english: The beautiful music is still lingering in my ears.
sentences.chinese: 美妙的音乐依然在我耳际萦绕。

definition: to drift/to wave/to float on the waves/to flutter in the wind
to pervade/to fill the air/diffuse/everywhere present/about to inundate (water)/permeated by (smoke)/filled with (dust)/to saturate (the air with fog, smoke etc)
variant of 彌漫|弥漫[mi2 man4]
variant of 迴響|回响[hui2 xiang3]
to dissipate everywhere (of light, sound, gas etc)
to spiral/to circle/to go around/to hover/to orbit
to ripple/to undulate/also written 蕩漾|荡漾
